com.cigital.insecurepay.common

Class AsyncCommonTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.cigital.insecurepay.common.AsyncCommonTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChatFragment.UploadFileTask, GetAsyncCommonTask, PostAsyncCommonTask

    public abstract class AsyncCommonTask
extends <any>
    AsyncCommonTask extends AsyncTask, that returns ResponseWrapper. This is a parent class that is extended by GetAsyncCommonTask and PostAsyncCommonTask. This class is used to communicate with the server using Connectivity class asynchronously with the UI thread, and displays a ProgressDialog while the application communicates with the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean checkConnection()
      checkConnection is a function that is called to see if the device has access to internet to be able to communicate with the server.
      protected ResponseWrapper doInBackground(java.lang.Object... params)
      doInBackground is the function that establishes a connection with the server in a background thread.
      protected void onPostExecute(ResponseWrapper responseWrapperObj)
      onPostExecute is a function that is called after doInBackground ends.
      protected void onPreExecute()
      onPreExecute is a function that is called before the establishing the connection.
      protected void postFailure(ResponseWrapper responseWrapperObj)
      postFailure is called when the server responds with an error code response.
      protected void postSuccess(java.lang.String resultObj)
      postSuccess is called when the server responds with a non-error code response.

      • AsyncCommonTask

        public AsyncCommonTask(Context contextObj,
                       java.lang.String serverAddress,
                       java.lang.String path)
        AsyncCommonTask is the parametrized constructor for this class.
        Parameters:
        contextObj - Contains the context of the parent activity.
        serverAddress - Contains the server address used to connect to the server.
        path - Contains the sub-path of the url to connect.

    • Method Detail

      • onPreExecute

        protected void onPreExecute()
        onPreExecute is a function that is called before the establishing the connection.

      • doInBackground

        protected ResponseWrapper doInBackground(java.lang.Object... params)
        doInBackground is the function that establishes a connection with the server in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        params - Contains the parameters that may be passed while calling doInBackground.
        Returns:
        ResponseWrapper Return an object of ResponseWrapper.

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(ResponseWrapper responseWrapperObj)
        onPostExecute is a function that is called after doInBackground ends.
        Parameters:
        responseWrapperObj - Contains the ResponseWrapper object with server response.

      • checkConnection

        protected boolean checkConnection()
        checkConnection is a function that is called to see if the device has access to internet to be able to communicate with the server.
        Returns:
        boolean Return a boolean value depending on if the network connection is available.

      • postSuccess

        protected void postSuccess(java.lang.String resultObj)
        postSuccess is called when the server responds with a non-error code response. This function performs all the tasks to be done in postExecute when server response is not an error.
        Parameters:
        resultObj - Contains the string sent from the server as part of the response. Server sends the Customer No in response.

      • postFailure

        protected void postFailure(ResponseWrapper responseWrapperObj)
        postFailure is called when the server responds with an error code response. This function performs all the tasks to be done in postExecute when server response is an error.
        Parameters:
        responseWrapperObj - Contains the response from the server in form of ResponseWrapper object.
